section.name: What is Fulcrum?
section.p: Fulcrum was originally created as part of the Turbine 3 effort. The idea was to be able to decouple the services from Turbine 2 allowing them to be used on both projects.

Fulcrum is currently evolving into a component repository for Turbine. Each service is being converted into a stand alone component that can be released independently of the other components. This will allow the Turbine project to to release components as they change instead of having to release everything at once.

section.name: Container compatibility
section.p: All components are compatible if Avalon's ECM container. Any dependancies on other components, system properties, or context elements is clearly documentmented in the docs for each component.
